lines: Use case: After PHQ-9 or clinician referral
Each group of statements describes a common emotional or physical experience. Please choose one
statement in each group that best describes how you have felt over the past two weeks.
Each question has 4 sentence-based options, only one selectable:
•  2 – I felt sad most of the time.
•  3 – I felt sad almost all the time and couldn’t shake it off.
•  0 – I felt hopeful about my future.
•  1 – I felt uncertain about my future.
•  2 – I felt the future held little to look forward to.
•  3 – I felt the future was completely hopeless.
•  0 – I did not feel like a failure.
•  1 – I felt I had failed more than others.
•  2 – I felt I had failed repeatedly.
•  3 – I felt like a complete failure as a person.
•  0 – I enjoyed things as much as before.
•  1 – I enjoyed things less than before.
•  2 – I got very little pleasure from activities.
•  3 – I could not enjoy anything at all.
•  1 – I felt guilty about small things.
•  2 – I felt guilty most of the time.
•  0 – I did not feel I was being punished.
•  1 – I felt I might be punished.
•  3 – I felt I was already being punished.
•  2 – I disliked myself most of the time.
•  0 – I was not overly critical of myself.
•  1 – I blamed myself more than usual.
•  2 – I criticized myself for many things.
•  3 – I blamed myself for everything that went wrong.
•  0 – I did not have thoughts of harming myself.
•  1 – I had thoughts of harming myself but would not act on them.
•  2 – I thought about harming myself seriously.
•  3 – I would harm myself if given the chance.
•  0 – I cried no more than usual.
•  3 – I felt like crying but could not.
•  3 – I felt so restless I couldn’t stay still.
Q12. Loss of interest in people or activities
•  0 – I maintained interest in people and activities.
•  1 – I felt less interested than before.
•  2 – I lost most of my interest.
•  3 – I could not make decisions at all.
•  1 – I felt less worthwhile than others.
•  3 – I had no energy at all.
•  1 – I slept slightly more or less than usual.
•  2 – I slept much more or less than usual.
•  0 – I was no more irritable than usual.
•  1 – I was more irritable than usual.
•  2 – I was irritated most of the time.
•  3 – I had almost no appetite or was overeating constantly.
•  3 – I could not concentrate at all.
•  0 – I was not more fatigued than usual.
•  2 – I felt exhausted most of the time.
•  3 – I was too exhausted to do anything.
Q21. Loss of interest in sex
Total Score = Sum of all 21 items
